translation.en: I'm Dan Schneider.
And I'm a pharmacist.
I can almost remember every piece of my life.
translation.zh: ‎我差不多能记得自己人生的全部

translation.en: And it's kind of a crazy story.
[crew member] If you keep it focused, we can go from the beginning.
translation.zh: ‎如果你保持专注 我们可以从头开始

translation.en: Okay, I can tell... I can try to tell a story, but how far do you want me to go before I stop?
translation.zh:
‎我可以试着讲个故事 但在停止前
‎你想让我讲到什么程度？

translation.en: You know, what's your next question?
[crew member] You can go all the way to...
-Okay, okay. I'll try, I'll try. -[indistinct chatter]
I've never tried to be an actor though.
-Don't be an actor. You're a real guy! -[laughs]
translation.zh: ‎别当演员 你是个真实的人！

translation.en: [Dan] I guess some people would call me...
obsessive, if you want to call it that.
translation.zh: ‎执迷不悟 如果你想那么形容的话

translation.en: You know, I have, like, hundreds of hours of videos and cassette tapes
translation.zh: ‎关于发生在我身上的那些事

translation.en: from wiretapping phone conversations...
translation.zh: ‎我有数百小时的录像带和磁带…

translation.en: about what happened to me.
[Dan] Let me just tell you something.
It was very inappropriate, the way the police went about doing what they did.
translation.zh: ‎警察的行事方式 非常不妥

translation.en: [man] Well, once again, Mr. Schneider, I resent the implication.
translation.zh:
‎再说一次 施耐德先生
‎我讨厌这种暗示

translation.en: [Dan] My son was murdered...
buying crack in the Lower 9th Ward.
The police have the attitude that it's another drug deal gone bad.
translation.zh: ‎警方的态度是又一桩出事的毒品交易

translation.en: And these kids maybe got what they deserved.
[man] You are not going to dictate to me. I'm talking.
translation.zh: ‎你别对我发号施令 我正在讲话

translation.en: [woman] You don't talk to people like that who just lost a son. We lost a son.
translation.zh:
‎你不能对刚失去儿子的人这样讲话
‎我们失去了儿子

translation.en: We just lost a son. He didn't lose a son, okay?
translation.zh: ‎我们刚失去了儿子 而他没有 好吗？

translation.en: He didn't lose a son!
[Dan] The New Orleans Police Department was corrupt
and almost none of the murders were ever solved.
But I was determined to get the killer off the street
and if the police wasn't gonna do it, I was gonna do it.
translation.zh: ‎如果警察不作为 那就由我来做

translation.en: [reporter 1] In other news, a St. Bernard family is on a campaign for justice.
translation.zh:
‎另一则新闻中
‎一个在圣伯纳德的家庭为正义而战

translation.en: [Dan] I wasn't gonna let 'em knock me down.
Twenty-three-year-old Danny Schneider was gunned down in his pickup truck.
translation.zh:
‎23岁的丹尼·施耐德
‎在自己的皮卡上被枪杀

translation.en: Police say that they have little to go on.
translation.zh: ‎警方说他们缺少跟进的线索

translation.en: Schneider's parents are grief-stricken.
[crying] He was a good kid.
He didn't deserve this.
In my fight to get Danny some justice,
translation.zh: ‎在我给丹尼伸张正义的斗争中

translation.en: I promise I will work hard...
to try to save other lives.
At first, my mission was to get justice for my son.
translation.zh: ‎最初 我的任务是为我儿子伸张正义

translation.en: But then I started noticing, in the drugstore,
translation.zh: ‎但随后我开始注意到 药店里

translation.en: an unusual amount of high-powered opiate prescriptions.
translation.zh: ‎强力阿片类药物处方的异常数量

translation.en: [reporter 2] Chalmette pharmacist Daniel Schneider says
translation.zh: ‎沙尔梅特的药剂师丹尼尔·施耐德说

translation.en: he's taken a leave of absence from his drugstore job
translation.zh: ‎他为了反对非法使用奥施康定

translation.en: to crusade against the illegal use of OxyContin.
[Dan] There was a certain doctor using her license
translation.zh: ‎某位医生正利用自己的执照

translation.en: to virtually decimate my community.
-Not only did I see malpractice... -[pills shake] ...I saw corruption, I saw conspiracy.
translation.zh:
‎我不仅看到了渎职
‎还看到了腐败 看到了阴谋

translation.en: People were dying every week.
-[cameras clicking] -Eighteen, and 20, and 25-year-old kids.
I could see my son's face in their face.
translation.zh: ‎我能在他们脸上看到我儿子的影子

translation.en: -[sirens wail] -[voice breaking] I couldn't save my son.
But I can save some other kids.
And I'm not gonna let this drug continue to kill.
translation.zh: ‎我不会让这个药继续剥夺生命

translation.en: I started realizing that there was a bigger mission here.
translation.zh: ‎我开始意识到这里有个更重大的任务

translation.en: OxyContin. It was produced by Purdue Pharma.
translation.zh: ‎奥施康定 产自普渡制药

translation.en: -And I saw this opiate epidemic... -[pills rattle] ...in its infancy.
translation.zh:
‎我在初期就看到了
‎这种阿片类药物的泛滥

translation.en: We were creating addicts all over this country.
translation.zh: ‎我们正在全国各地制造瘾君子

translation.en: Purdue could have done things to stop this,
translation.zh: ‎普渡本可以采取措施制止这一状况

translation.en: but they saw the profits.
Not only were they white-collar criminals...
they were white-collar murderers.
My son's killer paid a price.
translation.zh: ‎杀我儿子的凶手付出了代价

translation.en: What about Purdue Pharma? What price have they paid?
translation.zh: ‎普渡制药呢？他们付出了什么代价？

translation.en: They gave birth to a crisis that killed hundreds of thousands of people.
translation.zh:
‎他们孕育了一场危机
‎导致成千上万人丧生

translation.en: -What price have they paid? -[dramatic instrumentals fade]
[Dan] St. Bernard Parish, it's right next to New Orleans.
translation.zh: ‎圣伯纳德教区 紧邻新奥尔良

translation.en: We used to call it God's Country.
translation.zh: ‎我们曾称这里为上帝的国度

translation.en: Kind of sandwiched between the Mississippi River
and, really, the swamps.
St. Bernard was basically middle-class.
translation.zh: ‎圣伯纳德基本上都是中产阶级

translation.en: We have two major oil refineries,
and fishermen and crabbing and oystering.
translation.zh: ‎还有渔业 捕蟹和牡蛎采集业

translation.en: Somebody's always selling shrimp on the side of the road.
My dad used to take us, when we were little, me and my brother...
translation.zh:
‎在我和我哥小时候
‎我爸常带着我们…

translation.en: He'd tell us on a Sunday, "We're gonna take a ride to the end of the world."
translation.zh:
‎他会在一个周日跟我们说：
‎“我们要开车去世界的尽头。”

translation.en: He would drive us down, way down deep into the parish...
past Chalmette, Meraux, Poydras and Violet.
translation.zh:
‎穿过沙尔梅特 梅罗 普瓦德拉
‎和瓦奥莱特

translation.en: Way down to the end where Delacroix Island was.
translation.zh: ‎一直开到德拉克罗瓦岛所在的尽头

translation.en: And it was the Gulf of Mexico.
And he'd just say, "Here's the waters."
"Here's the Gulf. This is the end of the world to us."
translation.zh:
‎这是墨西哥湾，
‎这对我们来说是世界的尽头。”

translation.en: And we always thought that was the end of the world for everybody.
translation.zh:
‎我们曾以为对所有人来说
‎那都是世界的尽头

translation.en: [Dan] I started out in football as a lineman.
translation.zh: ‎我刚开始打橄榄球时是个线卫

translation.en: I actually had pretty good hands and I had great speed.
translation.zh: ‎我的双手非常灵活 速度也快

translation.en: -[sentimental instrumentals] -But I was blind as a bat.
-[whistle blows] -We had a tremendous football season.
translation.zh: ‎我们度过了一个精彩的橄榄球赛季

translation.en: When I saw Annie, she was just the cutest thing.
translation.zh:
‎当我看到安妮时
‎她就是我最可爱的人

translation.en: [Annie] I was a grade lower than him.
I liked his personality.
[Dan] I don't think I won her over because of my looks, okay?
translation.zh:
‎我不认为自己是靠颜值追到了她
‎好吗？

translation.en: But we just really fell in love with each other.
[Annie] We got married a couple of years after high school.
translation.zh: ‎高中毕业的几年后 我们结了婚

translation.en: I really didn't know what I wanted to do, to be quite honest with you.
translation.zh:
‎实话跟你说
‎我真的不知道自己想做些什么

translation.en: A friend of mine talked about the pharmacists having a great job.
translation.zh:
‎我的一个朋友说起
‎药剂师会有份不错的工作

translation.en: Didn't have a great interest in it. It's just...
I had to pick out something real quick
where I could reach my goals of having kids and having a house.
translation.zh: ‎这样才能实现有儿有房的目标

translation.en: I became a pharmacist in 1975.
-[cars rushing] -I worked for Bradley's Pharmacy.
You might call it a country drugstore.
translation.zh: ‎你们可以把它称为乡村药店

translation.en: I enjoyed being able to interact with the patients,
being able to actually feel like I was helping 'em.
translation.zh: ‎能真切的感受到我正在帮助他们

translation.en: I picked pharmacy and then I... I stuck with it.
translation.zh: ‎我选择了药房并坚守了下来

translation.en: [Dan] Aw, look who had a bath.
[Annie] We waited five years before we had our first child, Danny.
translation.zh: ‎在等待五年后 我们迎来了长子 丹尼

translation.en: It was wonderful to have a little boy to...
play with.
He was a good kid. Gentle and caring. He was just always happy.
translation.zh: ‎他是个好孩子 温柔体贴 总是很开心

translation.en: [Dan] Then we had a daughter, Kristi.
translation.zh: ‎然后我们有了个女儿 克丽丝蒂

translation.en: [Kristi] My family was very, very close, growing up.
translation.zh: ‎在成长过程中 我的家庭非常亲密

translation.en: We did all kinds of family vacations together.
translation.zh: ‎我们一起进行各种家庭度假

translation.en: [Dan] There's the old Tin Lizzie.
[Kristi] It was long travels. We would go across country.
translation.zh: ‎旅程很长 我们要横穿全国

translation.en: [Dan] That's the Shenandoah Valley outlook.
Here we are out in Alabama. It looks like the Alabama tree.
translation.zh:
‎我们在阿拉巴马
‎它看着像阿拉巴马树

translation.en: Many people thought we were like the Griswolds.
translation.zh: ‎许多人认为我们就像格里斯沃德家

translation.en: [Dan] Here we are. The Griswolds.
translation.zh: ‎我们到了 格里斯沃德家

translation.en: [young Kristi] Shut up!
[Annie] We had the same type of car they had.
Danny was like Chevy Chase.
[Dan] Intercourse, Pennsylvania.
We just seen some Amish people.
-[young Kristi] Amish people. -[hooves clomping]
As a matter of fact, when we had Christmas,
translation.zh: ‎事实上 当我们过圣诞时

translation.en: you know, it was like we used to get this big, giant Christmas tree.
translation.zh:
‎我们常会搬来
‎一棵巨大的 超大型圣诞树

translation.en: A seventeen-foot Christmas tree, we'd have in our house.
translation.zh: ‎我们会在家里放一棵五米高的圣诞树

translation.en: It was like Christmas Vacation every Christmas for almost 20 years.
translation.zh:
‎差不多20年时间里
‎每个圣诞节都像《疯狂圣诞假期》

translation.en: [Kristi] My dad, every year, wanted to get a tree...
translation.zh: ‎每年 我爸都想弄到一棵树

translation.en: Like the biggest tree you could get. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎差不多是你能弄到的最大的树

translation.en: [Annie] This is 1989.
[Kristi] My friends would come over
and relatives would come over and help decorate it.
translation.zh: ‎亲戚们会过来 帮着装饰它

translation.en: So it was like a family tradition.
[Annie] Okay, wait a minute.
And it just felt like the perfect life.
We didn't want for nothing else. We had everything.
translation.zh: ‎我们别无所求 我们已经拥有了一切

translation.en: [Annie] The Schneider clan.
-[Annie] Where are you, son? -[young Danny] Up here.
translation.zh:
‎-你在哪 儿子？
‎-在上面 ‎（小丹尼·施耐德）

translation.en: [Annie] Going on the plane from...
[Dan] My son was a really good-natured, compassionate kid.
translation.zh: ‎我儿子是个善良而有同情心的孩子

translation.en: As he got a little bit older, he really became kind of like a peacenik.
translation.zh:
‎随着年龄的增长
‎他变得有点像反战分子

translation.en: [Kristi] He was very creative. He liked to write poems.
translation.zh: ‎他非常有创意 喜欢写诗

translation.en: And a lot of my friends had crushes on Danny and it used to aggravate me.
translation.zh:
‎我的很多朋友都迷恋过丹尼
‎这曾让我恼火

translation.en: [Dan] Will he make it? Oh, Lord!
-[applause] -Almost!
Danny was a good dad. He was a doting dad.
translation.zh:
‎丹尼是个非常好的爸爸
‎他是个宠爱孩子的爸爸

translation.en: He made sure, you know, the kids had what they needed and wanted.
translation.zh:
‎他会确保
‎孩子们得到他们需要和想要的

translation.en: [Dan] Later on in life, when I had a few pennies,
I really wanted a project with Danny.
translation.zh: ‎我很想和丹尼一起做个项目

translation.en: Danny and I tore apart this Mustang.
Pulled the motor out and worked on, uh, rebuilding the car.
translation.zh: ‎拉出了发动机并着手重建这辆车

translation.en: We would go on long rides with that Mustang.
translation.zh: ‎我们会开着那辆野马长途旅行

translation.en: We both loved that car.
St. Bernard Parish was right down the street below the Lower 9th Ward.
translation.zh: ‎圣伯纳德教区在下九区的正下方

translation.en: One day, I took Danny to the Lower 9th Ward, which was in the city.
translation.zh: ‎一天 我带着丹尼去市里的下九区

translation.en: And we drove and saw the house that my family came from.
translation.zh:
‎我们开着车
‎看到了我家曾经住过的房子

translation.en: My family moved out of the 9th Ward
during the era of what you might call the "white flight."
It was racial.
[man] As a child growing up in the city,
a lot of African-Americans started started buying homes in the Lower 9th Ward
translation.zh: ‎许多非裔美国人开始在下九区买房

translation.en: and white Americans moved into St. Bernard.
translation.zh: ‎而美国白人则搬进圣伯纳德

translation.en: And it's like two different worlds.
At that time, it was a real, in-your-face type of racism.
translation.zh:
‎当时
‎这是种非常真实而直接的种族歧视

translation.en: All the time, they would call you a nigger
or they would write it on the car or they would write it on something.
translation.zh:
‎或者写在车上
‎又或者写在其他东西上

translation.en: That's what we grew up with, you know?
translation.zh: ‎我们是伴随着那些长大的 你懂吗？

translation.en: It was basically called a city into a city.
translation.zh: ‎这基本上被称为一个城市的改头换面

translation.en: [group] This day, I wanna be a girl's...
[Shane] We used to play softball on the levee.
We would have little penny parties, waistline parties.
translation.zh: ‎我们会办小成本派对 腰围派对

translation.en: As they would say, a wing dang doodle,
translation.zh: ‎正如常人所说 一段好时光

translation.en: when everybody would get together and just basically have fun.
But, in the '80s, the neighborhood had...
had totally changed.
[reporter] The housing projects and streets of New Orleans
translation.zh: ‎新奥尔良的住房项目和街道上

translation.en: are filled with people who are hooked on crack cocaine.
[Terrence] By that time, the crack epidemic was setting in.
translation.zh: ‎当时 毒品吸食开始泛滥

translation.en: It just got real bad.
[man 2] I grew up in the Lower 9th Ward.
And it was a place...
that we considered as hell.
You see white folks down here, you...
"Are you not the police? Or are you looking to score something?"
translation.zh: ‎“你不是警察吗？或你要买毒品吗？”

translation.en: The neighborhood that I was in, in the 9th Ward, that's all that came around.
translation.zh:
‎在第九区我所住的街区里
‎到处都是那样

translation.en: They was all from St. Bernard Parish,
you know, coming down to buy drugs.
[Dan] I had been aware at the time that a number of kids from St. Bernard
translation.zh:
‎当时我就注意到 ‎有许多
‎从圣伯纳德来第九区买毒品的孩子们

translation.en: had gotten shot to death up in the 9th Ward,
translation.zh:
‎有许多
‎从圣伯纳德来第九区买毒品的孩子们 ‎被枪杀了

translation.en: buying drugs.
And, much as I hate to say it...
I heard about it and read it in the paper and...
translation.zh: ‎我听说过 也在报纸上看到过 并且…

translation.en: my attitude at that time, and I'm not proud of it, okay, was...
translation.zh: ‎我当时的态度 我并不引以为荣 是…

translation.en: "Kids shouldn't have been up there."
[Annie] And now we're going into the Schneider house.
translation.zh: ‎现在我们正走进施耐德的家

translation.en: Let's see what's going on in here on Christmas Day.
translation.zh: ‎我们看看圣诞节这里发生了什么

translation.en: What you got, Danny?
[Dan] Danny had some difficulty, his senior year.
translation.zh: ‎丹尼在高三时碰到了些困难

translation.en: He barely graduated.
Some people could say these were warning signs,
translation.zh: ‎有些人可能会说这些是前兆

translation.en: but, at the time, we really couldn't see it.
translation.zh: ‎但当时 我们确实没能发现

translation.en: He went to Nunez Community College.
And even though he was 22 years of age, he was still living with us.
translation.zh:
‎即便他已经22岁了
‎还是跟我们住在一起

translation.en: He worked at Pizza Hut at night.
He had purchased a brand-new Ford Ranger pickup truck.
translation.zh: ‎他买了辆全新的福特游骑兵皮卡

translation.en: And, uh, he was really excited about that.
[Annie] His girlfriend had a scholarship
translation.zh:
‎他女朋友获得了
‎密西西比大学的奖学金

translation.en: to the University of Mississippi, so he would drive
translation.zh:
‎他女朋友获得了
‎密西西比大学的奖学金 ‎因此每周末他都会开着皮卡
‎往返于哈蒂斯堡

translation.en: back and forth to Hattiesburg every weekend
translation.zh:
‎因此每周末他都会开着皮卡
‎往返于哈蒂斯堡

translation.en: to see his girlfriend, which was a long way.
translation.zh: ‎去看他女朋友 ‎这段路程很长

translation.en: [Kristi] I think Danny was just struggling with what to do with himself.
translation.zh:
‎我认为
‎丹尼只是在纠结自己要干些什么

translation.en: [automated voice] Wednesday, 2:45 a.m.
[Danny] Hey, baby, um...
Just calling to say I love you.
Um... I can't wait to talk to you...
tonight.
I'll talk to you later. I hope you're having a good day.
translation.zh:
‎我晚点再和你聊
‎希望你度过愉快的一天

translation.en: I love you. Bye.
[Kristi] Well, I was just downstairs on the computer, doing my own thing and...
translation.zh: ‎我正在楼下用电脑 处理自己的事

translation.en: Danny came down the stairs and talked to my parents
translation.zh: ‎丹尼下楼来 跟我父母交谈

translation.en: and said he was leaving the house.
[Dan] "I'm going to a friend's house tonight
to study for a test that I have tomorrow in school."
[Annie] "Okay, don't be too late. You've got school tomorrow."
translation.zh: ‎“好的，别太晚。你明天还要上学。”

translation.en: You know, so he said, "I won't."
He said, "Love y'all," and he left. He said, "I'll be back soon."
translation.zh:
‎他说：“爱你们。”然后离开
‎他说：“我很快回来。”

translation.en: [Kristi] I heard him go out the back door and leave,
and that was it.
[Shane] I'm not sure. I think it was around 12 o'clock that night.
translation.zh: ‎我不确定 我觉得大概是当晚12点

translation.en: I was standing in front of my mom's house.
And as the red truck passed us, I could see it was a white guy.
translation.zh:
‎当那辆红色卡车开过时
‎我能看到那是个白人

translation.en: My friend, he said...
"Who that is? 'Cause he was looking at you."
I said, "I don't know who that is."
At two o'clock in the morning, we got a loud knock on the door.
translation.zh: ‎凌晨两点 有人大声敲门

translation.en: [Annie] I woke Danny up and said,
translation.zh:
‎我叫醒了丹尼并说：
‎“有人在敲门，

translation.en: "Somebody's knocking at our door. It's two o'clock in the morning.
translation.zh:
‎我叫醒了丹尼并说：
‎“有人在敲门， ‎现在是凌晨两点。会是谁？”

translation.en: Who can that be?" You know?
[Dan] There were two policemen at the front door and they came in
and said, "We'd like to come in and discuss something with you."
translation.zh:
‎他们走进来说：
‎“我们想进屋跟你们讨论些事。”

translation.en: [Annie] They said they found our son in the 9th Ward in New Orleans.
translation.zh:
‎他们说
‎在新奥尔良第九区发现了我们的儿子

translation.en: I said, "No, my son's upstairs sleeping. I don't know what you're talking about."
translation.zh:
‎我说：“不，我儿子在楼上睡觉。
‎我不知道你们在说些什么。”

translation.en: [Kristi] I just ran to his room...
to see if he was sleeping.
I said, "Okay, well, we'll go get dressed. I guess we'll get dressed."
translation.zh:
‎我说：“好吧，我们去穿衣服。
‎我想我们要穿衣服。”

they were gonna find out it was me.
